name: @heiwa4126/hello4
description: TypeScript hello world library with dual ES modules/CommonJS support. Features GitHub Actions trusted publishing to npmjs with Sigstore attestation.

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run rename-cjs
scripts.smoke-test: node examples/test1.mjs && node examples/test2.cjs && tsx examples/test3.ts && node dist/esm/main.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run smoke-test
scripts.format:full: npm pkg fix && biome format --write . && dprint fmt && textlint --fix "**/*.md"
